pageContext.description: Circumstances: "Bronze palstave dug up at Highdown in 1902 and now in the possession of Mrs. Henty of Ferring" (a) - dated 4/1/27,"In 1902 Mr. Henty found other bronze objects...other palstaves. No record seems to have been kept of these later finds which are preserved at Ferring" (a),Context: 7b. Group,Typology: Apparently stumps of broken loop; marked constriction of blade just below stop; thick butt
pageContext.collection: Henty, Mrs. - Private (1927),Ferring, Sussex,possibly now in Worthing Museum,3658,as Unprovenanced
pageContext.remarks: Archive: AFI,PRBAF: DF:C; SI,Ext. CI,Rec. Sn, Nov. 78,Source: R
